original_text: And Joseph made haste; for his bowels did yearn upon his brother: and he sought where to weep; and he entered into his chamber, and wept there.
korean_text: 요셉이 아우를 사랑하는 마음이 복받쳐 급히 울 곳을 찾아 안방으로 들어가서 울고

sentences.original_text: for his bowels did yearn upon his brother
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 속이 그의 형제를 향해 타는 것 같았으니

sentences.original_text: and he sought where to weep
and he entered into his chamber
